resume-about-me.title: üìñ About Me
resume-about-me.description: Full-stack developer with experience in TypeScript, applying it in both native development with React Native and Next.js for front-end, as well as in back-end architectures with Node.js and NestJS. Knowledgeable in microservices and messaging with RabbitMQ, focused on scalable and high-performance solutions.

1.description: An online store for fine jewelry, offering a stylish and modern collection for all occasions.

2.description: Remodeling specialists, turning architectural visions into reality for homes and businesses.

3.description: An online platform dedicated to the analysis and insights of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, created for educational purposes and not for publicity.

4.description: Task management app with statistics aimed at productivity.

5.description: Recreation of the social media platform 'Twitter'.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Residing in Florian√≥polis - SC, Brazil. Besides software development, my interests include listening to music, exercising, playing chess, and reading a good book.

personal-interests.title: Personal Interests
personal-interests.description: I am passionate about neuroscience, philosophy, and 'self-help'. I love diving into books that expand my understanding of the human brain, existence, and personal growth. Music is a big part of my life. Additionally, I am a jiu-jitsu enthusiast. This year (2024), I am celebrating my tenth year of training, and at 17, I am already a purple belt. Jiu-jitsu has taught me discipline, resilience, and strategic thinking. I have participated in approximately 40 championships.
personal-interests.image-1: Competing at the Compnet of Gracie Barra in 2023
personal-interests.image-2: Receiving the purple belt from the master
personal-interests.image-3: Receiving the gold medal after two submissions at Compnet 2023.
